item.title: 2.0.0 final released
item.description: Version 2.0.0 final was released. It contains no new features but many bugfixes.
item.author: Martin Eisengardt, martin.eisengardt@googlemail.com

item.title: 2.0.0-beta-4 released
item.description: Version 2.0.0-beta-4 was released. It contains no new features but many bugfixes. This will be the last beta before the release candidate.
item.author: Martin Eisengardt, martin.eisengardt@googlemail.com

item.title: PHP-Maven eclipse plugin 2.0.2
item.description: Version 2.0.2 of the eclipse plugin as released. It is compatible to the latest snapshot and the upcomming beta-4. Not compatibility to older versions. See the new update url.
item.author: Martin Eisengardt, martin.eisengardt@googlemail.com

item.title: 2.0.0-beta-3 released
item.description: Version 2.0.0-beta-3 was released. It contains a complete refactoring and massive bugfixes. See the link for full description of changes. You should visit the configuration page linked in the changelog because of some incompatible changes.
item.author: Martin Eisengardt, martin.eisengardt@googlemail.com

item.title: 2.0.0-beta-2 released
item.description: Version 2.0.0-beta-2 was released. It contains various bugfixes and the new zend archetype.
item.author: Martin Eisengardt, martin.eisengardt@googlemail.com
